title: Add LinkedIn social link to footer

requirements.text: Add a LinkedIn icon link to the Footer component pointing to https://www.linkedin.com/company/safarx-in/?viewAsMember=true, placed alongside the existing Instagram social media icon/link.
acceptanceCriteria: A LinkedIn icon is visible in the footer's social media links section
Clicking the LinkedIn icon opens https://www.linkedin.com/company/safarx-in/?viewAsMember=true in a new tab
The LinkedIn icon is styled consistently with the existing Instagram icon
The link has rel='noopener noreferrer' for security

constraints: Do not modify any immutable frontend paths
Use the same icon style and sizing as the existing Instagram social link in the footer
nonGoals: Adding any other social media platforms
Changing the footer layout or design
